attributes.action: Remove congestion charge during coronavirus crisis
attributes.additional_details: Right now so many work sectors are shutting down and others are struggling to continue. We must support the people who can keep working and them not be financially penalised for it.
attributes.background: Whilst there are such travel restrictions in place and the with the WHO recommendation of self isolation it is crucial that people can choose to travel to work in their own vehicle without being penalised by the congestion charge. This charge must be temporarily removed with immediate effect.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

Since you started this petition, TfL has suspended road charging schemes: https://tfl.gov.uk/info-for/media/press-releases/2020/march/tfl-suspends-all-road-user-charging-schemes-to-help-critical-workers?intcmp=62502

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
